decks.notes: Utilizing the synergy between land ramp and utility lands to quickly assemble the powerful Primeval Titan combo, generating massive board presence and overwhelming the opponent. The deck focuses on accelerating mana with cards like Azusa and Sakura-Tribe Scout, and searching for key pieces with Ancient Stirrings and Once Upon a Time. With Amulet of Vigor allowing for efficient land plays, the deck aims to tutor for Primeval Titan and combo with lands like Field of the Dead and Slayers' Stronghold to close out the game swiftly.

This deck focuses on building a strong board presence quickly by playing low-cost Human creatures that benefit from each other's presence on the battlefield. By utilizing cards like Champion of the Parish and Thalia's Lieutenant, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of creatures. The inclusion of cards like Reflector Mage and Deputy of Detention allows for disruption of the opponent's strategy, while Aether Vial helps to efficiently play creatures at instant speed. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistent access to the necessary colors for casting spells.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying powerful threats like Death's Shadow and Gurmag Angler to pressure the opponent. It utilizes cards like Thoughtseize, Inquisition of Kozilek, and Stubborn Denial to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also using cards like Snapcaster Mage and The Royal Scions for added versatility. The deck also includes ways to protect its threats with cards like Fatal Push and Dismember. By efficiently utilizing its resources and carefully managing its life total, the deck aims to close out games quickly with aggressive plays and efficient spells.

This deck focuses on quickly playing infect creatures like Blighted Agent and Glistener Elf, and then pumping them up with various spells like Might of Old Krosa and Groundswell to deal 10 poison counters to the opponent as fast as possible. The deck also includes protection cards like Vines of Vastwood and Blossoming Defense to ensure the creatures can get through for lethal damage. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with infect creatures and pump spells before they have a chance to stabilize and prevent the inevitable defeat.

This aggro Eldrazi deck focuses on deploying powerful threats like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer quickly to overwhelm opponents. By utilizing cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Chalice of the Void, it disrupts opponents' strategies and controls the board. The deck also includes utility cards like Dismember and Blast Zone to deal with threats and maintain board presence. With a mana base centered around Eldrazi Temple and Urza lands, the deck aims to ramp quickly and dominate the battlefield to secure victory.

The deck focuses on fast-paced aggression, utilizing cheap and efficient burn spells along with hasty creatures to deal damage quickly and overwhelm the opponent. The key strategy is to consistently have threats on board and keep the pressure on the opponent, while also disrupting their game plan with direct damage and preventing them from stabilizing. The deck aims to win the game before the opponent can establish a strong board presence or gain enough life to survive the onslaught of burn spells and creature attacks.

Utilize Eldrazi creatures and powerful disruption spells to quickly overwhelm opponents and close out games in the early turns. The deck aims to challenge the opponent's resources and disrupt their game plan while applying consistent pressure with efficient threats. With a mix of mana acceleration, card selection, and disruptive elements, the Eldrazi Aggro deck can quickly establish a dominating board presence and force opponents to react at a fast pace. The combination of powerful Eldrazi creatures and disruptive spells creates a fast and aggressive strategy that can be difficult for opponents to handle.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and a mix of removal spells and hand disruption to control the game. It aims to apply pressure early on, disrupting the opponent's game plan while maintaining card advantage with cards like Bedlam Reveler and Seasoned Pyromancer. The inclusion of Blood Moon can disrupt the opponent's mana base, giving the deck an additional edge. Overall, the strategy is to continuously pressure the opponent while disrupting their resources to secure a quick victory.

The main goal of this deck is to quickly pump up and protect your small infect creatures like Blighted Agent and Glistener Elf in order to deal 10 poison counters to your opponent and win the game. By utilizing cards like Scale Up, Might of Old Krosa, and Vines of Vastwood, you can surprise your opponent with a deadly attack. The deck also includes some protection with cards like Blossoming Defense and Spell Pierce, as well as mana ramp with Noble Hierarch and Once Upon a Time to ensure you can execute your combo efficiently.

The focus of this deck is to assemble the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Power Plant, and Tower) to generate a large amount of mana quickly. This allows the player to cast powerful threats such as Karn Liberated, Ugin, the Spirit Dragon, and Emrakul, the Promised End. The deck also includes control elements like Karn, the Great Creator and Oblivion Stone to manage the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent with its powerful threats and efficient mana production.

The deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures like Death's Shadow and Tarmogoyf while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Stubborn Denial. The deck also has ways to pump up Death's Shadow with cards like Temur Battle Rage and Ghor-Clan Rampager. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive strategy with lands that can provide multiple colors of mana. Ultimately, the goal of the deck is to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero while controlling the game through disruption.

The main concept of this deck is to take advantage of the Dredge mechanic to fill the graveyard with cards and then use cards like Cathartic Reunion and Life from the Loam to repeatedly bring back powerful creatures like Bloodghast, Narcomoeba, and Prized Amalgam. By constantly dredging and recurring creatures, the deck can overwhelm opponents with a steady stream of threats while also gaining value from cards like Creeping Chill and Conflagrate. The deck aims to quickly build a board presence and disrupt the opponent's game plan through graveyard manipulation.

The main concept of this deck is to use the Amulet of Vigor along with bounce lands to generate extra mana and play big threats like Primeval Titan quickly. The deck aims to assemble the Amulet Titan combo as fast as possible to overwhelm the opponent with powerful land drops and large creatures. The deck also includes utility cards like Summoner's Pact and Once Upon a Time to find key pieces of the combo efficiently. By utilizing the synergy between bounce lands and the Amulet, the deck can quickly set up for explosive plays and win the game through overwhelming board presence.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up lands onto the battlefield and play powerful spells like Primeval Titan and Through the Breach to deal massive amounts of damage using Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. By utilizing cards like Sakura-Tribe Elder and Explore, the deck aims to accelerate its mana base and consistently hit its land drops to trigger Valakut's ability multiple times in a single turn. Additionally, the deck includes disruptive elements like Mwonvuli Acid-Moss to slow down opponents and control the pace of the game.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble the combo of Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Primeval Titan in order to deal massive amounts of damage to the opponent's creatures or directly to their life total. The deck focuses on ramping with cards like Farseek and Sakura-Tribe Elder to quickly get to the required lands to activate Valakut's ability. Additional ramp and land destruction spells are included to help accelerate the combo and ensure its success. Lightning Bolt provides additional removal or reach to close out the game.

The deck focuses on using efficient creatures and disruptive spells to apply pressure on the opponent while controlling the board with removal. It aims to quickly deplete the opponent's resources and win through combat damage. The deck's versatile threats combined with hand disruption and removal give it a strong tempo advantage while putting pressure on the opponent's life total. With a mix of powerful planeswalkers, versatile removal, and efficient creatures, the deck can adapt to different types of matchups and maintain a threatening board presence throughout the game.
